Android: Available on any device that supports the hardware. Android Pay for NFC payments available in Play Store.[191]
iOS: 8+: iPhone 6/6 Plus and later (iPhone 5 and later if used with Apple Watch), via Apple Pay
4.3+: Personal Hotspot (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, USB; carrier dependent)

Feature: Direct file transfer over Wi-Fi Direct

iOS: AirDrop: 7+: Between iOS only; 8+: Between Mac/iOS only. (Note: AirDrop utilizes Wi-Fi as well)

Android: AAC LC/LTP 3GPP, HE-AACv1 (AAC+), HE-AACv2 (enhanced AAC+) AMR-NB, AMR-WB, MP3, MIDI (Type 0 and 1, DLS versions 1 and 2), Ogg Vorbis, PCM/WAVE, FLAC, WAVE, Opus[238]
iOS: AAC, protected AAC (from iTunes Store), HE-AAC, MP3, MP3 VBR, Audible (formats 2, 3, 4, Audible Enhanced Audio, AAX, and AAX+), Apple Lossless, AIFF, WAV[239]
Tizen: AAC, AAC+, eAAC+, AMR-NB, AMR-WB, MP3, Vorbis, WAV[240]
Sailfish OS: MP3, FLAC, AAC, eAAC, eAAC+, ALAC, AC3, DTS, Opus, Vorbis

Android: H.263, H.264 (up to Baseline Profile), H.265 HEVC, MPEG-4 SP, DivX, XviD, VP8, VP9[238] (WMV on 3rd party software like VLC media player)
iOS: H.264 (up to High Profile), MPEG-4, M-JPEG[239]
Sailfish OS: MPEG-4, H264, H263,[241] although audio in recorded videos is out of sync[242]

iOS: Up to 1080p via HDMI[244] or VGA,[245] 576p/480p via component[246] or composite;[247]

Feature: Wireless video/audio streaming to set top boxes/TVs/speakers
